definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: The other students admired his depth of understanding.
sentences.chinese: 別的學生佩服他的理解力深刻。

sentences.english: Nature's Blessing is now a trainable skill.
sentences.chinese: 大自然的祝福現理解力技巧。

sentences.english: They give more priority to the cultivation of my comprehensive qualities and all-round development.
sentences.chinese: 他們首先考慮的是我的理解力的培養和全面發展。

sentences.english: It expands the mind, sharpens the perceptions, and ripens the judgment.
sentences.chinese: 這種操練能使心智發達，理解力增強，鑑別力熟練。

sentences.english: When you ask questions, you are displaying your lack of knowledge and understanding.
sentences.chinese: 當你問問題時，你展現了你知識和理解力的欠缺。

sentences.english: With deep understanding and respect for different cultures.
sentences.chinese: 理解力強並能尊重不同文化的差異。

sentences.english: Get along with the first-class people, will have a more profound understanding of friendship.
sentences.chinese: 同一流的人物相處，就會對友誼有更加深刻的理解力。
理解力清晰，記憶力強健。

sentences.english: I am perceptive of the minutest detail .
sentences.chinese: 我由於微小的細節而有理解力。

sentences.english: Deep understanding and respect for different cultures.
sentences.chinese: 理解力強並能尊重不同文化的差異。

sentences.english: You will be surprised how good your comprehension is.
sentences.chinese: 你會驚奇地發現自己的理解力是多麼的好。

sentences.english: The old have weaker memory and understanding, and stronger commitments and worries.
sentences.chinese: 老人記憶力和理解力都較差些，有更多的擔當和擔憂。

sentences.english: Libran is a great listener and has good perception skills.
sentences.chinese: 天秤善於傾聽，有很好的理解力。
